title: Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work. Description: Color orange doesn't work.
OB: When setting the color or background color to orange for a report item, the color does not change.
EB: The color or background color of the report item should change to orange when selected.
SR: 1. Insert a report item. 2. Set the color or background color to orange. 3. Verify that the color changes to orange.
